name: Digitization profile validator for TIFF images
description:
This plugin checks if the images produced through digitization processes meet the expectations defined in a digitization profile. 
The digitization profile typically outlines rules and guidelines for minimum DPI resolution, compression type, photometric interpretation, and other technical aspects of the image file format. 
The goal of a digitization profile validator is to ensure that digital images are of sufficient quality and have the necessary technical attributes for preservation and accessibility over time.
